snippet: Beholder won the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Distaff by four lengths at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., on Friday, denying Royal Delta a third straight victory.
abstract: Beholder, ridden by jockey Gary Stevens, wins the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Distaff at Santa Anita by four lengths, denying Royal Delta a third straight victory.
lead_paragraph: Beholder won the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Distaff by four lengths at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., on Friday, denying Royal Delta a third straight victory.
